abstract: At least 26 women report being groped or sexually harassed at music festival in Darmstadt, Germany, reviving controversy over inappropriate behavior by refugees.

headline.print_headline: Women Report Being Groped at Music Festival in Germany
headline.main: Women Report Assaults at German Music Festival

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Germans have become newly vigilant about sexual abuse at mass events since New Year’s Eve in Cologne, when hundreds of women were assaulted.
lead_paragraph: Germans have become newly vigilant about sexual abuse at mass events since New Year’s Eve in Cologne, when hundreds of women were assaulted.
